response.overview: Ben buys a hard-to-find poisonous watermelon with the intention of making his son happy, but his wife forbids it for fear of danger. Every time Ben throws the watermelon away, it reappears in his car, causing further confusion. These strange events make Ben increasingly confused and anxious, forcing him to search for answers and face a surprising reality beyond his expectations.
response.title: Kalau Bukan Sekarang, Nanti
